AI Description: Anaconda3-rcpu is a distribution of Python and R programming languages along with a collection of open-source packages for data science and machine learning. It includes tools for data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and statistical modeling.
Core Features: Integration Of Python & R Programming Languages, Includes Popular Data Science Libraries & Tools, Support For Data Manipulation, Analysis, Visualization, & Statistical Modeling, Conda Package Manager For Easy Package Installation & Management
General Tags: Data Science, Machine Learning, Python, R, Conda
